item.title: Bitcoin Tour Colombia 2016: Venezuelans and Colombians Met to Learn About Bitcoin's Benefits
item.description:
Bitcoin Tour Colombia 2016: Venezuelans and Colombians Met to Learn About Bitcoin's Benefits

This past Saturday, August 27th Bitcoin Tour Colombia held its first event in Cucuta, it was part of a series that were organized across several cities including Bogota, Medellin and concluding in Cucuta located in the north of the border with Venezuela.

item.title: Ethereum and Ethereum Classic Experiences Significant Surge in Price
item.description:
Ethereum and Ethereum Classic Experiences Significant Surge in Price

Is crypto big enough for two "Ethereums"? Recent developments suggest so. During the last day, both Ethereum Classic and Ethereum have been growing in value, which suggests that there may be a place for both projects in the cryptocurrency scene.

item.title: Is Blockchain the Answer to Preventing Cybercrime?
item.description:
Is Blockchain the Answer to Preventing Cybercrime?

Director of Edgar, Dunn & Company, the management consultants, asks the question, can blockchain or distributed ledger technologies combat cybercrime in financial systems? As director of EDC's London office, Samee Zafar has advised some of the biggest financial services organizations in Europe and North America focusing on competitive strategy, operations, and technology.

item.title: Bank of Canada Predicts Increase of Bitcoin Value, in Case of Wider Adoption
item.description:
Bank of Canada Predicts Increase of Bitcoin Value, in Case of Wider Adoption

The Bank of Canada has joined the list of bank-related institutions to commission research papers regarding the use of digital currencies, particularly Bitcoin. Its two authors came up with an economic framework to analyze their exchange rates. The Bank of England had earlier released a research paper that studied the macroeconomic consequences of issuing central bank digital currency (CBDC).

item.description:

item.title: Lord Voldemort Is Trying to Save Bitcoin
item.description:
Lord Voldemort Is Trying to Save Bitcoin

An anonymous cryptographer, who refers to himself as Harry Potter's mortal enemy Voldemort, may have come up with a solution to address two of the biggest issues holding bitcoin back-and the community is beginning to take it seriously.

item.title: We've Hit Peak Blockchain Hype, Says New Report
item.description:
We've Hit Peak Blockchain Hype, Says New Report

According to the latest Gartner Hype Cycle Also Read: Ernst & Young Report: Prepare For Blockchain 'Critical Mass' report , Blockchain technology is just about at the Peak of Inflated Expectations. Meanwhile, cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and related businesses like exchanges are further ahead in the Trough of Disillusionment.

item.title: Microsoft Highlights a Brand New Way Hackers Can Get to Your Data
item.description:
Microsoft Highlights a Brand New Way Hackers Can Get to Your Data

Since security researchers have shared information about web proxy configuration in operating systems and browsers can be misused to steal user data, hackers have figured out how. A team of Microsoft Malware researchers spotted, as well as analyzed a new attack that utilizes Word documents with malicious code, with no need to install traditional malware.
